Description
neqsim.process.safety.scenario
Automatic scenario generation for safety analysis.
  • Classes in neqsim.process.safety.scenario used by neqsim.process.safety.scenario
    Class
    Description
    AutomaticScenarioGenerator
    Automatically generates safety scenarios from equipment failure modes.

    Represents a potential equipment failure.
    AutomaticScenarioGenerator.FailureMode
    Standard equipment failure modes.
